text:
Greetings, I hope this email finds you well!
(For some of you, it has been quite some timeğŸ™‚)
*As a note, this email is being sent to past/present teams who have worked in the Orlando office(s). There are qualifications which need to be met to be considered for participation in this upcoming project.
If you fit the following criteria, this email details a paid research opportunity that we are looking to bring to Orlando.
Requirement:
Strong, clear English speakers
Must be comfortable speaking in English for up to 3 hours.
Light accents will be accepted!
Must be able to read and understand English (to review prompts)
________________________________
Productive Playhouse's Southland office (near Florida Mall) is in the early stages of beginning a new type of project which will utilize participants. We will be seeking people interested in being considered in thisAI research project.
